## removeNode variable

Calls `.unsubscribe()` on given node and all of its outputs, then removes it from graph. Returns `false` if no node exists for given `id`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeNode: (graph: Graph, id: string) => boolean
```
